牑字的基本解释

牑
biān
床板；床篑。

牑
miàn
古同“緜”，屋篑。

牑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biān］
［《廣韻》布玄切，平先，幫。］
床上板。
[②]［miàn］
［《集韻》見切，去霰，明。］
屋箦。

牑字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【片字部】　牑； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页694第02
【唐韻】布田切【集韻】?眠切，?讀若邊。牀版也。【揚子·方言】牀上版。或曰牑。　又【集韻】蒲眠切，音駢。義同。　又【集韻】婢典切，音艑。牀簀。【說文】本從片，扁聲。　又【集韻】䁕見切，音麫。本作㰃。屋簀也。

牑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
牑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
牑
biān
Bed plank; bed frame.
牑
miàn
The ancient same "mian", the house 篑.
牑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biān］
["Guangyun" Buxuanqie, Pingxian, help. ]
The bed board.
[②]［miàn］
["Ji Yun" See cut, go to ha, Ming. ]
Hut.
牑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Collections】【Film Word Department】　牑; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 694 No. 02
[Tang Yun] Butian cut [Ji Yun] Sleep cut, read if you have a side. The bed version is also. 【Yangtze Dialect】On-bed version. Or it's called 牑.　[Jiyun] Pu Mianqie, sound pian. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] The maid’s code cuts, the sound is 艑. The bed. [Speaking text] Ben Congpian, flat sound.　 [Ji Yun] See you and cut, the sound is 麫. This is 㰃. The house is also.
